places.name: Kedarnath
places.description: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva, located amidst the majestic Garhwal Himalayas. A spiritual journey like no other.
places.bestTime: May to June, September to October

places.name: Badrinath
places.description: A holy town dedicated to Lord Vishnu, nestled between the Nar and Narayan mountain ranges. Part of the Char Dham Yatra.
places.bestTime: May to June, September to October

places.name: Mussoorie
places.description: Known as the 'Queen of Hills', this hill station offers stunning views of the Doon Valley and the Shivalik ranges.
places.bestTime: March to June, September to November

places.name: Nainital
places.description: Famous for its Naini Lake, this charming hill station is perfect for boating, shopping, and enjoying the cool mountain air.
places.bestTime: March to June, September to November

places.name: Rishikesh
places.description: The Yoga Capital of the World, where the Ganges flows. Perfect for spirituality, yoga, and adventure sports like rafting.
places.bestTime: September to November, March to May

places.name: Haridwar
places.description: One of the seven holiest places in India, where the Ganges enters the plains. Famous for the evening Ganga Aarti.

places.name: Auli
places.description: India's premier skiing destination, offering panoramic views of Nanda Devi and other Himalayan peaks.
places.bestTime: January to March (for skiing), April to June

places.name: Jim Corbett
places.description: India's oldest national park, famous for its Bengal tigers and diverse wildlife. A paradise for nature lovers.

places.name: Gangotri
places.description: One of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites and the spiritual source of the Ganges River. Surrounded by rugged Himalayan peaks.
places.bestTime: May to June, September to October

places.name: Yamunotri
places.description: The first stop in the Char Dham Yatra, dedicated to Goddess Yamuna. Famous for its thermal springs and scenic trek.
places.bestTime: May to June, September to October

places.name: Chopta
places.description: A pristine hill station famous for its lush meadows and as the base camp for the trek to Tungnath, the highest Shiva temple.
places.bestTime: April to June, September to November

places.name: Valley of Flowers
places.description: A vibrant national park known for its endemic alpine flowers and outstanding natural beauty. Accessible only by trek.

yatra.name: Char Dham Yatra
yatra.description: A sacred 10-day journey covering Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath. Price ranges from ₹27,500 to ₹35,000 per person depending on hotel category, food, and activities. Includes daily breakfast and dinner.
yatra.route: Haridwar/Dehradun → Barkot → Uttarkashi → Guptkashi → Kedarnath → Badrinath → Rudraprayag → Haridwar
yatra.bestTime: May to June, and September to October

yatra.name: Do Dham Yatra
yatra.description: A focused 6-day pilgrimage to the two most prominent shrines: Kedarnath (Lord Shiva) and Badrinath (Lord Vishnu). Price ranges from ₹18,500 to ₹25,000 per person depending on facilities. Includes daily breakfast and dinner.
yatra.route: Haridwar/Dehradun → Guptkashi → Kedarnath → Pipalkoti → Badrinath → Haridwar
yatra.bestTime: May to June, and September to October

yatra.name: Teen Dham Yatra
yatra.description: A specialized 8-day pilgrimage covering Yamunotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath. Price starts at ₹24,500 per person depending on facilities. Includes daily breakfast and dinner.
yatra.route: Haridwar/Dehradun → Barkot → Guptkashi → Kedarnath → Badrinath → Rudraprayag → Haridwar
yatra.bestTime: May to June, and September to October

yatra.name: Nainital & Jim Corbett Safari
yatra.description: A quick 4-day escape blending serene lakes and thrilling wildlife. Price ranges from ₹12,000 to ₹16,000 per person depending on hotel category. Includes MAP Plan.

yatra.name: Auli Chopta Snow Tour
yatra.description: Experience the snow-capped peaks of Auli and trek the pristine trails of Chopta, the Mini Switzerland of India. Includes complimentary bonfire and premium stays. Price starts at ₹16,000 and can increase based on hotel upgrades and additional activities.
yatra.bestTime: December to March (for Snow), April to June

metadata.title: About Us | Uttarakhand Tour & Travels
metadata.description: Learn about our journey since 2022. We are a trusted local operator providing safe, reliable, and comfortable travel across Dev Bhoomi.

hero.title: Our
hero.subtitle: "Providing a safe way to travel and explore Dev Bhoomi since 2022."

aboutSection.heading: Guided by
aboutSection.paragraph1: We started our journey around 2022 with a clear and vital mission: to provide people with a safe, reliable, and comfortable way to travel and explore the divine beauty of Dev Bhoomi (Uttarakhand).
aboutSection.paragraph2: What sets us apart is our hands-on approach. We are a dedicated local operator that owns and maintains its own fleet of vehicles. This ensures every journey meets our high safety and comfort standards, giving you peace of mind on the mountain roads.
